Hi, I'm Rihan

My interests lie in web development, artificial intelligence, and data analytics. I enjoy creating innovative solutions that improve user experiences and streamline complex processes.

About

Me

Here's where I share my journey through tech, highlighting the experiences and passions that drive my innovative pursuits.

I am a passionate Software Engineer with expertise in backend and full stack development, as well as artificial intelligence and machine learning. Fluent in languages like Python, JavaScript, C, C++, and Java, I enjoy building innovative web technologies and products. My interests extend to data analysis as well. With experience in Node.js and modern JavaScript frameworks like React.js and Next.js, I thrive on developing impactful solutions. As a Problem Solver and tech innovator, I continuously seek opportunities to apply my skills and contribute to the tech community.

My

Skills

Here are some of my skills where I've turned knowledge into expertise, making things happen.

(1)

Web Development

Web Development involves creating websites and web applications that are both visually appealing and highly functional. It encompasses a variety of technologies, frameworks, and best practices to ensure a seamless user experience and efficient performance.

(2)

AI/ML Engineering

AI/ML Engineering involves developing and deploying machine learning models and artificial intelligence systems. This skill covers a range of technologies, frameworks, and best practices to create intelligent solutions that can learn and adapt from data.

(3)

Database Management

Database Management involves efficiently storing and organizing data. This skill covers a range of technologies, frameworks, and best practices to ensure data integrity, security, and performance.

(4)

Data Analytics

Data Analytics focuses on extracting, analyzing, and interpreting data to support decision-making and strategic planning. This skill includes a variety of technologies, frameworks, and best practices to uncover insights and trends from complex datasets.

My

Projects

Here are some of my projects where I've turned code into cool, functional stuff.

Personal Portfolio Website

A personal portfolio to showcase my coding projects, resume, and skills.

ECOR-CMS

A Complaint Management System for the East Coast Railway Department, facilitating efficient handling and resolution of complaints.

PositiVITi

An anonymous counseling chat application designed for introverted students seeking counseling services without revealing their identity.

Driver Drowsiness Detection

A computer vision application using Python and OpenCV to detect driver drowsiness by analyzing facial landmarks and blinking patterns in real-time.

OdiaLang

The Custom Coding Language project is an endeavor to create a simple programming language along with tools for lexing and compiling code.
